title: Rival mo Raku ja nai
original_name: ライバルも楽じゃない
sinopse:
She asks a guy she doesn't like on a date and clings to him. That is because she is acting as a role in Love Rival for her shy friend. Her friend Hitomi is supposed to Confess to Itsuki and her mission is complete! But..for some reason, she can't look at Itsuki's face directly. It seems she also fell in love with Itsuki and...?!
(Source: ChibiManga).
